page.title: 02The Changes In Our Area
page.content:
In 1830 Tolworth and Surbiton area had only a few houses,but most of it was countryside.Surbiton was a small village.In the 1830's the railway came to Surbiton and lots of things began to change. {TODAY.
There are lots more: flats,houses,firms,industrial estates,motorways and lots of roads. Also there are more jobs.
{BEFORE.
There were more: farms,fields and not many roads.There were small roads but no dual carriageways.There also was a smaller population and less jobs. {BY { SARAH WILSON & BEVERLEY { SEARLE _
